- get_shadow() returns theme-appropriate shadows (light/dark intensities)
- status_color() returns theme-appropriate status colors
- get_theme() returns valid Flet theme configuration for both modes

- main.py _toggle_theme() properly rebuilds UI after theme change
- Verified all components import theme colors consistently
